description:
Amulet is a new and innovative Minecraft world editor made by the Amulet Team, a team formed by the contributors that brought you MCEdit-Unified

#### Package Parameters:

 - `/NoDesktopShortcut` Do not create Desktop Shortcut
 - `/NoStartMenuShortcut` Do not create Start Menu Shortcut

#### Package updates
   
New versions of this package are published automatically via the `update.ps1` script (viewable in the package source on GitHub).
summary: The new age Minecraft world editor and converter that supports every version since Java 1.12 and Bedrock 1.7
author: Asval
